questions.question: The line at which sky meets ground
Looked with difficulty because of the smoke

answers: to see how the war would end

and surveying the damage they had done

answers: He pulled his horse's head in panic
His cart toppled and he fall into the pool

answers: He realized that the Martians had attacked his neighbourhood
And Martians had defeated the army

questions.question: (Write) HOw did the speaker wonder about this
answers: He wondered weather martians were just machines
which could think and take decisions

answers: He did not find whather the martians were intelligent machines or not
